question: Dravid Bowie, who passed away recently, was the well-known actor from which country?
explanation: David Robert Jones (69), an English singer, songwriter and actor, has recently passed away in New York City, United States. He was posthumously honoured with five Grammy Awards in various categories viz. Best Alternative Rock Album, Best Engineered Album (Non-Classical), and Best Recording Package for Blackstar, and Best Rock Performance and Best Rock Song for the albumâ€™s title track at the 59th Annual Grammy Awards-2017.
